name: Slime Busters
description:
The objective of the game is to catch all the slimes in the level, Their remaining numbers is displayed on the Bottom Right corner of the screen.

To catch the Slimes, point your vacuum cleaner at them using the mouse and shoot with the left mouse button.

the Slimes all have their own health, when their health reaches 0 due to you vacuuming them, they will be sucked and successfully caught.

The player starts with 3 health and touching the slimes removes 1. you can collect more health by collecting health pickups or by collecting 4 health fragments that the slimes sometimes drop.

The vacuum cleaner has a energy bar, which depletes on use, to recharge it, use a recharge station or collect an energy pickup

To help you find the slimes, there is an arrow pointing to the nearest one below the player.

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD
  • Jump - Space
  • Pointing the vacuum - mouse
  • Vacuuming - Left Mouse Button
